title: BRIEF-Life Healthcare Sees FY HEPS 85-95 Cents
text:
BRIEF-Life Healthcare Sees FY HEPS 85-95 Cents

Stock Markets 15 minutes ago (Oct 24, 2019 08:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Life Healthcare Sees FY HEPS 85-95 Cents Oct 24 (Reuters) - Life Healthcare Group Holdings Ltd : * TRADING STATEMENT * SEES FY HEPS 85.0 TO 95.0 CENTS * SEES FY NEPS 110.0 TO 120.0 CENTS * EBITDA LOSS RELATED TO ONE OFF ITEMS DURING CURRENT YEAR, WILL BE APPROXIMATELY R124 MILLION * SEES FY EPS 170.0 - 180.0 CENTS * SEES FY REVENUE R25 350M TO R25 900M * NORMALISED EBITDA MARGINS FOR YEAR WILL DECLINE TO AROUND 22.2% (2018: 23.6%) * EXCLUDING SOME ITEMS, FY EBITDA MARGIN WOULD BE MORE OR LESS IN LINE WITH 2018 AT ABOUT 23.2%

BRIEF-Life Healthcare Sees FY HEPS 85-95 Cents
description: BRIEF-Life Healthcare Sees FY HEPS 85-95 Cents
